item.title: On Tea Partiers & Rule-Free Systems: Football, NASCAR & Regulatory Authority
item.description: I know I am generalizing, but since many that I know and love subscribe to many of these philosophies maybe I do have a small bit of perspective here. Let me take a look at the Free Market system and rules. Many have argued that rules are inherrently anti-market. That the opposite of capitalism is rule-making by regulators. Maybe that is right in some areas, but I would argue that it depends on the specific area in mind.
